title: FS: 1890 Bill Joyce Cabinet Brooklyn Players League
author: rholmes

posts.post_title: FS: 1890 Bill Joyce Cabinet Brooklyn Players League
posts.post_content:
FS: Wonderful 1890 Waldon Smith cabinet photo of Bill Joyce, 3B for Brooklyn Ward's Wonders in the Players League. Look closely and you can see traces of BROOKLYN across Joyce's chest. Additionally, this was the image used for Joyce's 1895 N300 Mayo's card!

Size: 4-1/8" x 6-3/8"

Cabinet has one spot of damage at right border (tear, see scans), otherwise good. Joyce's name inked in script on photo.

Price: $ SOLD

PM or email with interest.


Thx,
Ray
